reviews.review_msg: He is the best Econ prof I had in my undergrad. I have taken two courses with him and learnt a lot. Through his teaching style I developed a huge interest in the course content. Also he makes the course content very relevant to the todays market. He teaches with a lot of passion.

I've taken two courses with Emrul so far and he is the best professor i've ever taken with. He is so passionate and always be willing to help students. He cares so much about his students and he is very knowledgeable because He is a former CFA. If you want to learn real stuff, take it with him!
Best prof ever. Tough course, but his teaching is amazing :) Learned a lot of real life stuffs.
Emrul is one of the best professors if not THE best, you'll be glad you took any of his class
Great professor, gives us lots of real-world examples and really tries to make us understand the fundamentals rather than memorize a bunch of stuff. Tough class, but worth it.
Interesting prof. Failed on midterm but he did the adjustment for final grade. very flexible. The final exam is pretty fair and based on sample.

Failed mid, didn't give up, received a satisfying final grade eventually. He was fair to every students, as long as you followed his instruction, made an effort to the course, you will survive.He can make a boring lecture interesting, good instructor.

He is definitely one of the best instructors I have ever had. He keeps the lectures very interesting. He is funny which is a plus and he is very passionate about what he teaches. He is very knowledgable.  I'd definitely recommend this prof and I am personally hoping to take more courses with him in the future. He is simply amazing.
